name: Rushscape Dungeon
description:
You are trapped in a dungeon which is also inhabited by a deadly fog that follows you as you try to traverse tricky obstacles. Jump and slide to reach the end and escape!

Created for the 7dfps 2020 game jam.

Controls KeyFunctionW A S DMoveSpaceJumpShiftSprintCtrl/Right MouseCrouch, SlideEscPause
